com.eduworks.ec.framework.history

Class HistoryClosure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eduworks.ec.framework.history.HistoryClosure

  • public class HistoryClosure
extends java.lang.Object
    Object stored in the ScreenManager's history cache array, to keep track of the history of screens and which DOM element they were displayed in
    Author:
    devlin.junker@eduworks.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String containerId
      ID of the container to display the screen in, once it has been found by page name
      java.lang.String pageName
      Name of the page (used to retrieve the correct screen on a back/forward button press)
      EcScreen screen
      Screen to store and associate with the page name so that it can be loaded if necessary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HistoryClosure(java.lang.String name, EcScreen screen, java.lang.String containerId)
      Constructor for the HistoryClosure Object

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • pageName

        public java.lang.String pageName
        Name of the page (used to retrieve the correct screen on a back/forward button press)

      • screen

        public EcScreen screen
        Screen to store and associate with the page name so that it can be loaded if necessary

      • containerId

        public java.lang.String containerId
        ID of the container to display the screen in, once it has been found by page name

    • Constructor Detail

      • HistoryClosure

        public HistoryClosure(java.lang.String name,
                      EcScreen screen,
                      java.lang.String containerId)
        Constructor for the HistoryClosure Object
        Parameters:
        name - Page Name associated with this page (used for loading history screens)
        screen - Screen to associate with the page name (to display when loading history screens)
        containerId - DOM Selector (ID) of the HTML container to display the screen in on load history
